channel.title: Conduit / @conduitxyz
channel.description: Twitter feed for: @conduitxyz. Generated by nitter.freedit.eu

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: It's tempting to see @Base's success and to try and copy their strategy (modulo superficial branding)
The builder realizes that they will need to build a unique application to differentiate, and control the full-stack
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
It's tempting to see @Base's success and to try and copy their strategy (modulo superficial branding)

The builder realizes that they will need to build a unique application to differentiate, and control the full-stack

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Read our breakdown of total cost of operations here and find out what it really costs to run a rollup. https://www.conduit.xyz/blog/rollup-total-cost-of-operations-tco/
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Read our breakdown of total cost of operations here and find out what it really costs to run a rollup. conduit.xyz/blog/rollup-tota‚Ä¶

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Total cost of operations is more than what you pay for each piece of infrastructure.
It‚Äôs also about how the infra impacts:
Time to launch Ability to add new tooling Upgrade times Agility to pursue new opportunities UX
Each of these can make or break your chain‚Äôs success.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Total cost of operations is more than what you pay for each piece of infrastructure.

It‚Äôs also about how the infra impacts:

Time to launch
Ability to add new tooling
Upgrade times
Agility to pursue new opportunities
UX

Each of these can make or break your chain‚Äôs success.

item.title:
You don‚Äôt need to break the bank to launch a rollup.
But you do need to think about how your rollup infra choices impact total cost of operations.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz

item.title:
This is a huge day for Ethereum and everyone who believes in the rollup-centric roadmap. Congratulations @unichain!
Conduit is honored to help secure the chain by running a validator.

ZK makes Ethereum one big chain.

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Team at @conduitxyz is top notch. Excited to be working with them to accelerate the eventuality that is ZK.
Along other great ZK teams we will see the rapid adoption of ZK allowing rollups to unlock new features and a better user experience.
item.dc:creator: @JacobEv3rly
item.description:
Team at @conduitxyz is top notch. Excited to be working with them to accelerate the eventuality that is ZK.

Along other great ZK teams we will see the rapid adoption of ZK allowing rollups to unlock new features and a better user experience.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: ZK can make that interoperability happen by bringing rollup withdrawal times down from 7 days to 1 hour.
Read the full thesis here. https://www.conduit.xyz/blog/zk-interoperability-ethereum/
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Ethereum has nearly everything it needs to be the world computer of the future
Credible neutrality Most dev talent Growing performance thanks to rollup scaling
The only thing missing is seamless interoperability to make using those rollups feel like using one chain
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Ethereum has nearly everything it needs to be the world computer of the future

Credible neutrality
Most dev talent
Growing performance thanks to rollup scaling

The only thing missing is seamless interoperability to make using those rollups feel like using one chain

item.title:
2025 prediction: Rollups will embrace ZK and unlock interoperability across Ethereum and its L2s.
ZK has never been easier to implement with tools like @SuccinctLabs OP-Succinct and @RISCZero Kailua.
This is Ethereum‚Äôs secret weapon against the ‚ÄúEthereum killers.‚Äù
